item.title: Canal Sur, Womack Studios, Diffferent Develop Gibraltar-Set Thriller ‘The Rock’
item.description: Andalusian public broadcaster Canal Sur TV has teamed with Seville’s Womack Studios and Diffferent Entertainment to develop Gibraltar-set historical drama-thriller series “La Roca” (“The Rock”).

item.description: Andalusian public broadcaster Canal Sur TV has teamed with Seville’s Womack Studios and Diffferent Entertainment to develop Gibraltar-set historical drama-thriller series “La Roca” (“The Rock”).
